description:
The Cumberland Road Studios Wood Green is host to 50 artists and makers currently occupying studios in a 1980s former office building. You will have the opportunity to see their work and their workspaces as  part of their Open Studios.
The space will be active with events including workshops, demonstrations and artists' talks.
facilities: Handrails on one side of stairs

factsheet.heading: Open Studios at 40 Cumberland Road
paragraphs:
Join us for a weekend of activities and art at 40 Cumberland Road, where over 50 creatives and artists occupy studios in the building. 
See how an office building has been adapted into creative spaces and talk to the artists and designers about their work.
As you wander around the building you are welcome to join us for a taster workshop, a maker's talk or a casual chat.

factsheet.heading: Change of use
paragraphs: Initially built as a conventional office building in the 1980s to house several  Haringey Council services, use has now been adapted into 2 floors of affordable work space for local creative businesses and artists. The repurposing of 40 Cumberland Road will form part of the Corridor of Culture in Haringey's Borough of Culture 2027.
